title: Boss of Tadej Pogačar, UAE Emirates: ‘Jonas Vingegaard Is Favorite for the Tour de France’
content:
Mind games begin as UAE top staffer deflects pressure from Giro d'Italia winner Pogačar and his assault on the grand tour double.

Read the full article at Boss of Tadej Pogačar, UAE Emirates: ‘Jonas Vingegaard Is Favorite for the Tour de France’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
